content:
isaacvetter edited Issue #271(assigned to isaacvetter)

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 65

Submitted by @bvdh from Philips Healthcare

Chapter: Hooks
Section: Overview
Type: NEG :exclamation:
In Person Requested? Yes :bust_in_silhouette:

Comment:
Add Conformance LanguageÂ¶
The key words "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT", "SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT", "RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in this specification are to be interpreted as described in RFC2119.

## Triage Information

Triage Notes:
Reviewed with Bas

Proposed Disposition: Persuasive with Mod
Proposed Disposition Comment:
We will move hooks.md into the 1.0.md file which would address this since we have this language already in 1.0.md

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._

isaacvetter commented on Issue #271

resolved per PR #426. Closing.
